Download raw data from sources

Source: R/download.R
download_data.Rd

Download raw data from sources

download_data(
  dataset_name = c("aqs", "ecoregion", "geos", "gmted", "koppen", "koppengeiger",
    "merra2", "merra", "narr_monolevel", "modis", "narr_p_levels", "nlcd", "noaa",
    "sedac_groads", "sedac_population", "groads", "population", "plevels", "p_levels",
    "monolevel", "hms", "smoke", "tri", "nei"),
  directory_to_save = NULL,
  data_download_acknowledgement = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

dataset_name

character(1). Dataset to download.

directory_to_save

character(1). Directory to save / unzip (if zip files are downloaded) data.

data_download_acknowledgement

logical(1). By setting TRUE the user acknowledge that the data downloaded using this function may be very large and use lots of machine storage and memory.

...

Arguments passed to each download function.

Note

  • All download function names are in download_*_data formats

See also

For details of each download function per dataset, Please refer to:

  • download_aqs_data: "aqs", "AQS"

  • download_ecoregion_data: "ecoregion"

  • download_geos_cf_data: "geos"

  • download_gmted_data: "gmted", "GMTED"

  • download_koppen_geiger_data: "koppen", "koppengeiger"

  • download_merra2_data: "merra2", "merra", "MERRA", "MERRA2"

  • download_narr_monolevel_data: "narr_monolevel", "monolevel"

  • download_narr_p_levels_data: "narr_p_levels", "p_levels", "plevels"

  • download_nlcd_data: "nlcd", "NLCD"

  • download_noaa_hms_smoke_data: "noaa", "smoke", "hms"

  • download_sedac_groads_data: "sedac_groads", "groads"

  • download_sedac_population_data: "sedac_population", "population"

  • download_modis_data: "modis", "MODIS"

  • download_tri_data: "tri", "TRI"

  • download_nei_data: "nei", "NEI"
